prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Site located in area near what was an 18th-c. waterfront tavern and is now known as the Archer Cottage.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Architectural drawing showing front elevation of the Archer House in Yorktown, VA
